page.title: 17CHRIST CHURCH ESTOVER
page.content: The large housing estate of Estover has a new Ecumenical church:- Christ Church, Estover. THe building is shared by different denominations who do all they can together. Four ministers, from the Church of England, the Methodist Church, the Baptist Church and the Roman Catholic Church, work together as a team. A survey of the local population showed that only 17% attend services but approx. 81% believe in using the church for Baptism, Marriage and Funerals. The most common reasons given for this were :- (1) "It's traditional." (2) "It's what the church is for." (3) "It's the proper thing to do."
